text: cng klaw theid muhammad “phwk cea cng cheuxfang ptibati ta mxallxhˌ læa cng cheuxfang ptibati ta mxal rx sul hak phwk khea phinhlanghı thæcring hnathi khxng khea (rx sul) khux sing thi di thuk mxbhmay læa hnathi khxng phwk cea khux sing thi di thuk mxbhmay chen kan læa hak phwk cea cheuxfang ptibati tam khea læw phwk cea k ca xyu nı thang thi thuk txng (hi da yahˌ) læa hnathi khx ngxal rx sul mimi xun dı nxkcak kar pheyphær xan chad cæng
